name: Rastro
long_description:
Share your space and aspirations, get carefully chosen products in your inbox, and only pay for the products you love.

Interior designers often quote 2-3x the cost of items to redecorate a space, with little room for iteration. Rastro is a steerable interior designer, to help you build a space you love. Receive dozens of products a week in your inbox, and tell us which ones to deliver to your doorstep. Our pricing is a transparent 10% commission on purchases.

Under the hood, we're building agents capable of sourcing products matching your taste and constraints from 46 platforms. Our algorithms consider images and descriptions, as well as product style, materials, brand and location.
